// src/utils/api.js
import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000';axios.defaults.baseURL=API_URL;// Turfs
export const getTurfs=params=>axios.get('/api/turfs',{params});export const getTurf=id=>axios.get("/api/turfs/".concat(id));export const createTurf=data=>axios.post('/api/turfs',data);export const updateTurf=(id,data)=>axios.put("/api/turfs/".concat(id),data);export const addTurfReview=(id,data)=>axios.post("/api/turfs/".concat(id,"/reviews"),data);// Bookings
export const createBooking=data=>axios.post('/api/bookings',data);export const getMyBookings=()=>axios.get('/api/bookings/my');export const cancelBooking=id=>axios.put("/api/bookings/".concat(id,"/cancel"));// Teams
export const createTeam=data=>axios.post('/api/teams',data);export const getTeams=params=>axios.get('/api/teams',{params});export const getTeam=id=>axios.get("/api/teams/".concat(id));export const joinTeam=id=>axios.post("/api/teams/".concat(id,"/join"));export const removeTeamMember=(teamId,userId)=>axios.delete("/api/teams/".concat(teamId,"/members/").concat(userId));// Matches
export const createMatch=data=>axios.post('/api/matches',data);export const getMatches=params=>axios.get('/api/matches',{params});export const updateMatchScore=(id,data)=>axios.put("/api/matches/".concat(id,"/score"),data);export const completeMatch=(id,data)=>axios.put("/api/matches/".concat(id,"/complete"),data);// Payments
export const createPaymentOrder=data=>axios.post('/api/payments/create-order',data);export const verifyPayment=data=>axios.post('/api/payments/verify',data);export const getMyPayments=()=>axios.get('/api/payments/my');// Chat
export const createOrGetChat=data=>axios.post('/api/chat',data);export const getMyChats=()=>axios.get('/api/chat/my');export const sendMessage=(chatId,data)=>axios.post("/api/chat/".concat(chatId,"/message"),data);export const getChatMessages=(chatId,params)=>axios.get("/api/chat/".concat(chatId,"/messages"),{params});// Notifications
export const getNotifications=params=>axios.get('/api/notifications',{params});export const markNotificationRead=id=>axios.put("/api/notifications/".concat(id,"/read"));export const markAllNotificationsRead=()=>axios.put('/api/notifications/mark-all-read');// Analytics
export const getLeaderboard=params=>axios.get('/api/analytics/leaderboard',{params});export const getDashboardAnalytics=()=>axios.get('/api/analytics/dashboard');export const getTurfOwnerAnalytics=()=>axios.get('/api/analytics/turf-owner');// Matchmaking & Recommendations
export const findTeamMatches=(teamId,params)=>axios.get("/api/matchmaking/teams/".concat(teamId),{params});export const findPlayersForTeam=(teamId,params)=>axios.get("/api/matchmaking/players/".concat(teamId),{params});export const getTimeSlotRecommendations=params=>axios.get('/api/recommendations/timeslots',{params});export const getNearbyMatchRecommendations=params=>axios.get('/api/recommendations/matches',{params});
